page.title: 06Mr.Bowler,Shottle(interview)
page.content: { {Holly Seat Farm}is a dairy farm.There are 60 friesian cows and 126 beast altogether.One of the beast is a bull.The farm is 155 acres,43 acres of corn and the rest is grass.Also there are sheep,pigs,hens and 2 peacocks. They have one horse in a paddock which is 11.2 hands high.Its name is Silver. There is a pony which is 20 years old. They have 4 tractors.Contractors do the combining. They are near Handley Wood.The people who shoot there employ the gamekeeper. He looks after and breeds pheasants in Handley Wood. Mr.Bowler's mother has seen a ghost at Holly Seat. She could feel someone and saw a man in a dark suit over 60 years old. He was leaning on the table. He disappeared and has never been back since her husband died.
